justifications: Goldman rated Fresnillo (LON:FRES) a 'sell' at 1,194p as recently as 15 June.
The price is now well over 1,900p, blowing Goldman's call well out of the water for the foreseeable future.
The performance that's been mirrored by Randgold in London, up by more than 30% in sterling terms to 9,730p at the last count.
Goldman also called Gold Fields (JSE:GFI) a sell at R63.8, setting a R50 price target.
